mapper.select: SELECT cm.club_member_id FROM club_member cm INNER JOIN club c ON cm.club_no = c.club_no INNER JOIN chat_room cr ON c.chat_room_no = cr.chat_room_no WHERE c.club_no = #{clubNo} AND cr.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo}
select * from club_member where club_no=#{clubNo} and club_member_id=#{memberId}

SELECT m.member_id, m.member_name, cm.club_member_no, cm.club_member_rank, cm.join_message, cm.join_date, a.attach_no FROM club_member cm JOIN MEMBER m ON m.MEMBER_ID=cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID left outer join member_profile mp on m.member_id=mp.member_Id left outer join attach a on mp.attach_no = a.attach_no WHERE cm.CLUB_NO=#{clubNo}
select count(*) from club_member where club_no=#{clubNo}
SELECT club_member_rank FROM club_member WHERE club_no=#{clubNo} AND club_member_id=#{clubMemberId}
select club_member_no from club_member where club_no=#{clubNo} and club_member_id=#{memberId}
select club_member_rank from club_member where club_member_no=#{clubMemberNo}

SELECT a.attach_no,mm.meeting_no,cm.club_member_no,cm.club_member_id,cm.club_member_rank FROM meeting_member mm JOIN club_member cm ON mm.CLUB_MEMBER_NO = cm.CLUB_MEMBER_NO left outer join member_profile mp on cm.club_member_id = mp.member_id left outer join attach a on mp.attach_no = a.attach_no WHERE mm.MEETING_NO = #{meetingNo}
mapper.update: update club_member set club_member_rank='운영진' where club_member_no=#{clubMemberNo}
